author: DistroTube
description:
I recently discovered this neat Android app that includes 6056 manual pages as well as a bunch of general Linux terminal tips. It works 100% offline, doesn't need an internet connection and is free and open source software.

REFERENCED:
► https://github.com/SimonSchubert/LinuxCommandLibrary

title: Get Linux Documentation On Your Phone! (Linux Command Library)
